body_html: TF doesn't use numpy style broadcasting for all ops, just for elementwise operations (specifically binary elementwise operations). Referring to elementwise ops is sufficient; there's no need to list them all.
body_text: TF doesn't use numpy style broadcasting for all ops, just for elementwise operations (specifically binary elementwise operations).  Referring to elementwise ops is sufficient; there's no need to list them all.
body: TF doesn't use numpy style broadcasting for all ops, just for elementwise operations (specifically binary elementwise operations).  Referring to elementwise ops is sufficient; there's no need to list them all.
